DataListSpec.Name: Active Users Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing active users records.
DataListSpec.Author: Abel C. Debela

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_ACTIVEUSERS
as SELECT AU.ID as ID ,ISNULL(AU.DISPLAYNAME,AU.USERNAME) as NAME ,C.LOOKUPID as LOOKUPID ,ISNULL(USERROLE.NUMBEROFROLES,0) as NUMBEROFROLES FROM APPUSER AU LEFT JOIN CONSTITUENT C ON AU.CONSTITUENTID = C.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT APPUSERID,COUNT(*) NUMBEROFROLES FROM SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER GROUP BY APPUSERID) USERROLE ON AU.ID = USERROLE.APPUSERID ORDER BY ISNULL(AU.DISPLAYNAME,AU.USERNAME) COLLATE SQL_Latin1_General_Cp437_BIN
